website_summaries.verdict: While its short battery life keeps it from true greatness, the Plantronics BackBeat Go 2 is a superior wireless Bluetooth in-ear headphone.
pros: The lightweight, reasonably priced Plantronics BackBeat Go 2 wireless stereo headset improves upon the Go 1, with better sound quality and a sweatproof design, The step-up BackBeat Go 2 + Charging Case includes a protective case that has a built-in battery for charging on the go
cons: no carrying case included unless you buy the BackBeat Go 2 + Charging Case ($20 more)

customer_reviews.title: Almost not a Meh
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well for about a year then they stop working all together. The return policy was solid, returned them with no hassles as they were just still in warranty (they do their job really well when they work) so win. Sure enough about another year goes by and they stop working again but this time they fall apart too. Pro: Great when they work Helps cut down on the stupid people holding their phone or texting while driving Cord Free Stay Synced Cons: Cord rubber sticks to your skin so a quick head turn can send them flying They. Will. Fail. You. Battery life shortens with time
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Loyal Plantronics Customer
customer_reviews.text: I ran across the Plantronics booth at Pax Prime in 2013. I got a FREE GameCom780 AND version 1.0 of these very earbuds! They were the first Bluetooth earbuds I ever had. Fast forward 2 years and they got eaten by my brother’s puppy. Had to go without for a while. Anyway. I bought theses for my Wife (I am using the Plantronics Fit-something and still have my GameCom780) and the quality is just as impressive as when I had mine years ago! Plantronics has always been ahead of its time!
customer_reviews.author: Wrathmen

customer_reviews.title: these headphones are definitely pretty decent! Unlike most bluetooth in-ear headphones currently in ...
customer_reviews.text: The reviewers that tout strong bass in these headphones don't really know what strong bass is.... As a "basshead", I was expecting a little bit more from these in the bass department. With that said, these headphones are definitely pretty decent! Unlike most bluetooth in-ear headphones currently in the market, all of the bulk lies in the earpiece themselves, so it's pretty sleek around the neck. They're lightweight, and with the proper seal on the ear, the sound they can produce is actually pretty good. My biggest peeve, however, is in the battery life. If you're planning an all-day hike or bike ride, or outing, you should bring an extra pair, as these will only last you about 4-5 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel V. F.

customer_reviews.title: Inferior version with no charging pouch
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my lost Backbeat Go 3 earbuds and didn't realize this was a Backbeat 2 Really wanted another charging pouch (great way to store the earbuds and hard to find) which was not included. Although similar, the Backbeat 2 buds are disappointingly bigger and heavier. Bluetooth connection is also slower, and volume is not as great. I really like my Backbeat 3's (which I found after the Backbeat 2's arrived). I recommend making sure you get the 3 version. And make sure it comes with a charging pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Baumgartel

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: I love these things, the sound quality is very good and the fit outstanding. One really nice thing about the BackBeat Go 2 is the stabilizer can be rotated a full 360deg and with my ear, I can tuck the stabilizer in at just the right spot and it actually presses the bud into my ear. Plus these are a great value. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: Defected product
customer_reviews.text: This is second time I bought these headphones, first pair worked many years no problem. The coating over the wires started to break apart so I bought a new one. I charged the new headphones but the charging light never turned from red to blue even after 6+ hours charging. When I tried to turn on (pressing square play button) headphones will not turn on and will not pair. Complete waste of money. Would not recommend to a friend, would not buy again. 0/10 very dissatisfied and disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for Home and Office Use
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a few years now and they work great for everything except working out.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice feeling material
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these for a short time but really only have one gripe. The material the strap is made of is so tacky that it catches on skin and on clothes causing some tugging on the ear pieces. It's a nice feeling material, but a silly choice for this application. Otherwise the headphones work very well and fit quite nicely. I have tried many in-ear headphones and these are as good as any (among a category where many do not stay in). I decided to forego the charging case - they're very compact to carry if you have a small pouch you can use and are easily charged on the go using a general use external battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Close, but not quite what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bluetooth headset to use mainly whenever I'm working out at the gym, running, mowing the lawn, and these sorts of activities. I wanted something with good sound quality, not too heavy or bulky, and would just seem normal. I bought these originally because I liked how simple they looked. Once I received them and tried them on, I didn't really care for the size of the ears buds, the fit, or how well they stayed in. If you turned your head one way or another it seemed to jerk them out of my ear. For these reasons, I decided to go with the LG Tone+ HBS-730 and have been very satisfied thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: A Real Companion
customer_reviews.text: Really good stereo bluetooth headset. Easy pairing.As soon as you turn on your Bluetooth ((after it's been paired), it connects instantly all the time. Good to bring for brisk walks because it can be very discreet and not cumbersome.Bass is ok but not as deep as my LG Electronics Tone+ HBS-730. However, for the long range it gives you,it is a joy to have. It will stay connected even without line of sight. I can walk to another room, my second floor or the basement without my phone in my body, bluetooth connection's still there- this is where Plantronics Backbeat GO 2 beats LG Tone+ HBS-730.
customer_reviews.author: Mesh

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The volume is different in each ear. It's more than twice as loud in the right ear as the left. I'd used the Plantronics BackBeat Go (original version) for years and loved them. Even though I live in Korea and it cost more to order these from Amazon and have them shipped here, I did because the original ones were so good. The new "Go 2" arrived and straight out of the box they're junk. It's no good trying to exercise or go running when the music is basically just coming from one earpiece. Due to the international shipping rates, it's probably not worth trying to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Brad J. Derksen

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my 2nd pair. I love them! I wore my first pair out with constant use and abuse for more than a year. They're very hardy and took a real beating before finally starting to fail. My only complaint is that the latest model has slightly changed the rubber ear inserts and they don't fit quite as well. The result is a slightly reduced max volume. As someone w/ a minor hearing problem, volume is important. I would give them 5 stars if I could just get them a little louder on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Good price. Very helpful that the system tells you "power on" and "power off" as well as batter level. The only thing is size and thickness of neck cord. Re: size they do stick out of your ears a bit and sometimes fall out. Re: neck cord, it's a bit inflexible and sticks out as well.can get caught on shirts or jackets. And makes them a little hard to wrap up. A choice of colors would be nice too. I'm sure that's coming next. All in all, I would still recommend as a quality, well priced item with great balanced sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michel J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: small ear canal?
customer_reviews.text: Be leery if you have small ear canal. This works great, easy to use, stay in place. For me though after extended use they hurt my ear canals. I don't think it is the products fault, I have always had trouble getting ear buds that don't hurt. I know design wise there is a fine balance between the ear bud size and keeping them in place. I am giving 4 stars because for me they are a bit large and hurt my ear canal. I will keep using them, I'll just not use for more than an hour or so at a time.
customer_reviews.author: PAM

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this model
customer_reviews.text: I found the battery life on these limited and the earbuds far too thick. The rubber rings that are included don't make the fit any better and the only way I am able to keep them in place is with a headband. The sound and mic quality are good, however. I am a fan of Plantronics but will buy a different brand with better fitting earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Opine

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Plantronics, using their products both at work and at home. But, this set of earbuds is my favorite product ever. I'm on here purchasing a second set with the charging case now. No over-ear pinching or fatigue, and NO more accidentally ripping my plug-in earbuds out of my head while working out. I love these with my iPhone for music and my Ipad and Macbook for watching movies and TV. Incredible. Oh, and obviously they only require a bluetooth connection, I just happen to be an Apple kind of tech guy.
customer_reviews.author: Brent9286

customer_reviews.title: Best Stereo Bluetooth I have owned - with flaws
customer_reviews.text: This is the best I have used. it is comfortable to wear long use and is stinken wireless! There are still a lot of flaws which I wish they could solve. The earbuds keep falling out of my ear, i've tried larger tips and smaller ones, with the problem still happening. When I work out, i guess i sweat too much in my ears. Which by the way, has not broke this device. So I am happy about that. Charging is very easy as it uses the micro USB cord. every thing uses that these days which makes things so much easier. I hope this helps in deciding whether or not you want to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Pack

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I am no audiophile, but sound great to me. Like especially because they are clear, can keep volume down and still hear well. Important to me because these in ear buds & hearing loss freaks me out. I use for walking and they stay in, but could see how with more strenuous activity & swear they may fall out of ear easily. Call clarity is not the best, but clear enough to be usable. Would not recomend for important business calls, but for a quick call while exerciaing they are great, wife easily hears me over treadmill/traffic/wind.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Going wireless
customer_reviews.text: Rated these earbuds 4, because the bass tone is a little better than the S10. For fit purposes, smaller ear cushions would be nice to accommodate people with small ear canals but cushions are comfortable for extended ware. Controls are easy to use and love the voice indicating operating status (power on/off, level high/low and more). Battery endurance could be a bit better but I would still recommend this item. The cell phone micro works as well as the phone being used.
customer_reviews.author: LANGUY

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy here, the same price buys a cute charging/storage case elsewhere on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Comparing these to Beats, so not overwhelmed at the fit and the quality of the sound. They don't have a super comfy neck thing, just a wire that gets caught on clothing. Plus, this item is missing a carrying case. I'm not impressed, wish I just splurged on the beats. These are half the price, but also half everything as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: amazon@accelocom.com
customer_reviews.text: I have owned two of these. Both of them broke in under two years. Plantronics service replaced the first one for free, but it took a lot convincing. Not worth the waste of time and money. Poor quality. They get two stars since they worked for a little while and Plantronics gave me a replacement, but now the second pair stopped working. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Roel Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very good execution.
customer_reviews.text: Having used a large number of stereo bluetooth headphones including Plantronics Voyager 855. For sports, both creative and jaybirds are deent, but I really like how the Plantronics feel the moment they came out of the box. From the spoken connectivity/battery information, to the sound quality, it is now my favourite walkabout and workout earphones. Comfortwise, they feel secure, but not too big for my Asian ears
customer_reviews.author: D. Lye

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and fit ok
customer_reviews.text: Bought these before our vacation to Australia. They worked great. They will work for about 3 hours before needing a new charge. The fit is not perfect in the ear. they kind of feel like they will fall out but they don't. They feel a little different in the ear than normal earbud headphones but you get use to it. Sound quality is not top sound quality but it is good. I have better quality earbuds but they are not bluetooth. Overall, I have enjoyed this product and will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Localbuzz

customer_reviews.title: One side has normal volume, other side is very weak.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted these to work! I like the design, and the 8 devices feature is awesome! So why the low rating? Unfortunately, it's like a mono sound rather than a stereo sound, as the side with the microphone has normal volume, but the other side is barely hearable. So it's mono with a noise track. Dang. I wish I knew if this was normal or they are defective. I would love to hear from the company and will change my review if the replacement works properly.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Rick Kirschner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. I had to buy a new set and upgrade after 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. One day it just dies and would ...
customer_reviews.text: First one I owned lasted for more that 2 years. Loved it. One day it just dies and would not charge or power up. Reset did not work. Figured it was old. Gladly ordered a new one. Had that one for 30 days and it did the same thing. Died right in the middle of a client call. Not good. Very disappointed. I used to talk up the BB Go 2 to all my friends. No more.
customer_reviews.author: Smithmic

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Batteries keeping charge well after a year
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Batteries keeping charge well after a year. Gets over 4.5 hours of listening time. The fit is fine with different sized gel. But it does not provide any grip so may fall out if you move very rigorously.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Felix Lam

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product does all manufacturer claims. I find sound quality very good and I'm "picky" because I wear hearing aids to compensate for high frequency hearing loss. Bass response is good as it can get for "ear bud" style and high frequency is excellent. I can hear high frequency sounds that would go unheard without my aids. Easy to operate and pair with my phone and other devices. Bought these to use at gym to be rid of wire.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: If I could give this product no stars, I ...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product no stars, I would, but that clearly is not an option. What can I say? These bluetooth headphones are awful. The sound quality is diminished....you have to literally push these things halfway into your skull to get a decent listen out of them. I am a runner, and they tend to slip and fall out, even with the largest buds inserted! The remote control ended up not working after about 3 months. The "on" button would magically turn on the phone dial, or these headphones would magically turn itself off mid-listen. Avoid at all costs!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Light, small, works as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Its small, its light, the audio quality is no Hi-Fi, but clear enough. All the pros and cons is as you would expect, but batter life is BETTER than I expected. Battery life is not bad at all, considering the small size. I mainly listen to audio book with it and it lasts about 3 hr continuous listening time, after half a year. And I don't feel occasionally standby and taking short phone calls is cutting into that time.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaojun Ma

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds. I use them everyday, from my tablet to my phone. They music is clear as are phone calls. The range on them is the best. I've walked out to my backyard to grill, while my tablet was left in the livingroom, and it was clear listening through two solid walls, and two closed solid doors. Heck even my husband was impressed when I let him try on the earbud as he didn't believe me. Ordered him a pair not too long after.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is inconsistent - none of the inner ear fittings work for me. I've never had that issue before.
customer_reviews.author: Craig W Kuehne

customer_reviews.title: Backbeat Go 2 Review
customer_reviews.text: I had the earbuds for 1 day. I love the fact that it has voice prompts. I noticed a slight static as soon as I pair with my iPhone 4S. Static goes away once music starts, but static returns during between songs at times. I tried pairing with my iPad - and no static. Not sure what may be causing the issue. So far I am happy with the Backbeat Go 2 earbuds. Controller are very easy to use. I wish sound was a little louder. Used it while I ran but noise cancellation works well - couldn't hear cars as I ran near the streets. I will keep this review updated.
customer_reviews.author: David Lim

customer_reviews.title: Problems with fit
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, decent microphone (which is what i was looking for). Two problems: first, I am not quite sure how they're supposed to fit in my ears... They just don't stay up/in, and it hurts quite a bit. Two, they were supposed to provide 6 ear tips: 2 small, 2 medium, 2 large, instead I got 1 small and 3 large.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted a pair for Christmas and lost them. I thought about buying a different brand but happy I stuck with these. I also bought my fiance a pair for his birthday and he enjoys them too. They do not fall out while running and I use them to talk on the phone while driving. My order from this seller came in the retail box and did not appear to be previously used.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics BackBeat GO 2 Bluetooth Wireless Stereo Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light weight set of Bluetooth ear buds and this fits the bill. Easy to pair with my phone so that I can listen to Pandora and I Heart Radio. Also it is easy to answer or make phone calls with this device. It charges in about 2 hours. and lasts about 5 to 6 hours. It will notify your when the charge is getting low. I have been very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Unable to charge product and packaging was ripped. Returned same day received.
customer_reviews.author: matthew meunier

customer_reviews.title: product arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: product did not power on out of the box. didn't even get to use it and had to make my first ever return to amazon. seller unreliable for remitting new product in working order.
customer_reviews.author: Sangjin Lee

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with charging case
customer_reviews.text: False advertising! This headset package does not include the charging case as stated in the description. I received my replacement headset for the first package that I assumed just had the charging case missing but that was not the case. The battery on this headset definitely needs a charging case if you intend to use this headset on and off throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when buying ear buds because of a lot of critical reviews. I'm happy I went with these. So far they have worked flawlessly, no connection issues, fit comfortably and the sound quality is good. I'm very picky about sound quality, especially in the low to low-midrange frequencies, but these are just fine and crystal clear. Don't waste more money than this, I doubt higher priced ear buds would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: BackBeat Go Go Go Stop.
customer_reviews.text: battery life is 2 hours... hey battery scientists!! get with it!! put in some overtime and get us some 6 hour battery life earbuds to complain about. I imagine battery life complaints will taper off after a bluetooth earbud can last for 12 full hours of music.
customer_reviews.author: Old Man LeSage

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - not the answer for running
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily for running, having owned a few BT headsets in the past that don't really work well in that environment. Well, these are not a good candidate for running headphones. The buds themselves are very heavy (comparatively) and they don't stay snug inside the ear canal while running. Also the control stub bounces up and down on my shoulder causing a large "thump thump" to be conveyed through the speakers (think stethoscope analogy). Otherwise - sound quality is excellent and when not running, the design (the bud cap and plastic ring) works well to keep the earphones tight inside your ear...
customer_reviews.author: John F. Wehman

customer_reviews.title: I use these for work everyday. I use to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work everyday. I use to have the original backbeats and upgraded to these. big difference in sound quality and volume. no longer need to have them maxed out. as for the battery its about the same. 4 hours of use on a charge. This one also talks to you instead of using beeps and sounds. When you turn it on "power on, headset connected" etc
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Guy

customer_reviews.title: Better options available
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, but there are better options out there. The earbuds themselves are very long so they stick out of your ear very far. Also, the cord is a bit thick and unmanageable. The JayBird BlueBuds X Sport Bluetooth Headphones are worth the extra money. They are smaller, with a thinner cord, and best of all have two simple clips that let you make the cord as long as you want. Over the ear with the clips is very sleek and snug.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and convenience
customer_reviews.text: The battery quality is decent, especially considering how small this unit is, and the sound is excellent for a Bluetooth headset. I take this everywhere, walking, running, whatever I am doing. I love being able to connect wirelessly since I use a LifeProof case on my iPhone (and don't want to always bother with the audio adapter piece).
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my second pair, my first pair lasted for a long time until I wore them out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: So far, really good, been using them for abouth 3 weeks, battery life is good (around 4 hours) using them at a decent volume level. Very light weight, but if you use them with a jacket or collar shirt, the cord might get stuck, but nothing so important. I consider it an excellent product, and very usefull if you dont like to have a cord to your phone or music player.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boscan

customer_reviews.title: Great but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of the bluetooth signal for music and calls, and battery life is great considering size ( I get 3-4 hours of use). Also love not having a cable tethering my phone to my head! After about 6 months the left ear has started to buzz, but if I push and poke it sometimes it will stop. For that much money they should last longer (I haven't been hard on it).
customer_reviews.author: JD04073

customer_reviews.title: they were painful and cut out all outside sounds
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds would not stay in my ears. If I crammed them into the ear canal, they were painful and cut out all outside sounds. After about two days the left earbud lost volume. I would have liked smaller silicon cups than those provided.
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Battery life was poor even when they were new
customer_reviews.text: Battery gave out after less then 12 months. Battery life was poor even when they were new, but now it simply refuses to charge. Avoid these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: netscorerTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Works good. pay attention to
customer_reviews.text: Works good. pay attention to: 1- battery life is short (around 3 hours of playing + 12 hours stand by). 2 - Usually I have to restart my phone to get clear sound (and the issue is not related to phone). 3 - Using it with Samsung S4. Does not work with PS3 / PS4
customer_reviews.author: Pablo B

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: I had the backbeat go 1 and thought it was great until my little dog used it as a chew toy. So I purchased the backbeat go 2 and wow it's way better! Lots of people want a longer battery life but 4 hours works just fine! When I go to the beach I put my iphone in a ziplock baggy and wear the headset, perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Dead in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The headset died less than six months after purchase. Battery life was poor and not evenly spaced, i.e. if "high" I maybe had threef hours, is "medium" maybe one hour, and if "low" about 15 minutes. Pairing was easy and it worked with my home phone and iPod without any difficulties
customer_reviews.author: Ché

customer_reviews.title: Plantronics BackBeat Go 2 with Bose replacement earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Original earbuds started to fall out after 4-5 months of use so I decided to replace them with a pair of Bose earbuds. Sound quality was sort of improved and headphones stay in place even when running. Sound quality: don't expect Bluetooth headphones to sound just as regular/wired headphones. If you accept that beforehand, your expectations will be more realistic. Battery life: you'll have to charge it after every workout (aprox 2 hour use). Overall, I'd still recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: wasabi

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for approx a year right now. The left side has completely failed. I'm quite careful with things like earphones, being a dj and all. That said, the earbuds pair easily, decent range for their size and decent sound if you fit in the right rubber tips and can get them to sit right. I now need to get a replacement for these faulty ones, i'm not sure that I will be getting another set of the Plantronics.
customer_reviews.author: Anu

customer_reviews.title: horrible.
customer_reviews.text: These broke pretty much right away. Had to get a refund. the process was easy though so thanks for that plantronics !
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bluetooth headset. It connects easily and delivers a great sound, good balance of bass and treble, It is easy to wear and use. I receive compliments every time I use it. I would recommend using the extra ear pieces that allow it to fit solidly in your ear, they keep the buds in nice and tight. Highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love but issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought these had absolutely no problem pairing them used them hated the way that they fit. All of the tips are too big for me. I paired it easily with my Iphone 5C, a few weeks later I changed phones to a 5S and the phone and the earbuds aren't communicating and I can't pair them up. Not sure what step to do next. If I can get them to pair up with the new phone and get smaller tips I will LOVE these, but as of this minute I'm rather frustrated with them.
customer_reviews.author: TtownTLC

customer_reviews.title: Breaks everytime within 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two pair of these and so far........I have had bad luck with them. The first pair that I purchased sound quality in the left ear bud got worse over time to the point were it would not work. Finally I used my wifes pair that I purchased and the same exact thing happened to here pair after wearing them over time (6month). I would recommend them because of the fit build, but if you can't hear good quality music reliably then what is the point in having them when you need them esp. in the GYM.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Rahmings

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these when i jaybird freedome wireless died after only 1 year! These are okay. I tried the different sized tips and they still hurt my ears and the right one wouldn't even stay in. Very distracting. The little rubber ring that you can pull around the ear peice to change fit is a joke. I wanted to return them but missed the deadline of 18 April.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of headphones!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of ear buds, I use them at the gym and for doing yard work around the house. The sound is pretty good, not amazing but better than average. They do a great job of cancelling out noise, the slightest movement does make it hard to hear the music but I would imagine this is more of a problem with all ear buds not this pair. Overall they stay in place and more importantly out of the way!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kokoris

customer_reviews.title: they're nice...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted some head phones for the office so I didn't have to worry about cords as well as having noise cancelling. They do that but I need to charge them when I go for lunch or they die. Also when I'm walking to/from work and the cord is brushing my coat I can hear that very clearly so that part is a bummer. Good fit to my ear though
customer_reviews.author: WisCompton

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but connectivity issues.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good headphones. Battery life is decent and the sound quality is great. The only problem is I can't seem to get them to connect to my Samsung Galaxy S3 and they work fine on my Nexus 7 tablet. I would say for the price these are some of the better headphones you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Nosepress

customer_reviews.title: best headphones I have owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I have owned. I was hoping they would be small enough to fit under a motorcycle helmet, but they don't. Still I love not being attached to my phone any longer. It's great for listening to music on the go or talking on the phone in the car, etc. Get a pair and you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: works amazingly.. im so glad my friend suggested these to me.. voice is very clear.. and sound is amazing.. comparable to my Bose headset.. only issue is they tend to fall out when i use it for running. otherwise.. using it for walking and just hanging around your head they work very well..
customer_reviews.author: Df186

customer_reviews.title: Horrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Horrible battery life. I only get 45 minutes out of it before it tells me the battery is low. Ear buds fall out constantly when running as well. Sound quality is okay, but I have had cheaper headphones give better sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo_Stuck_In_TX

customer_reviews.title: At first they were pretty awesome - good sound
customer_reviews.text: They're alright. At first they were pretty awesome - good sound, stayed in place, easy to connect etc. Over time, they don't stay in my ears as well, and the one headphone has developed a static at moderate-high volume. I would bite the bullet and spring for higher quality next time.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Lockwood

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought the earphones in October 2013 and in April 2014 bluetooth just stopped working. And I hadn't even used the earphones that much. The device stopped being recognized/found by other devices. Haven't talked to the company yet due to busy schedule.
customer_reviews.author: P.P.

customer_reviews.title: I really like them.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because the description said it would have up to 14 hours of battery life listening to music. However, my battery only last about 2 hours. I have only had them a few days but I have never gotten more than 2 or 2 1/2 hours use from the battery. This is very disappointing since the only reason I wanted them was for the supposedly long battery life. Other than that, I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life. It died completely after little over a year
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a year and two months, then it died in the middle of a call. Obviously, I'm out of warranty. I used it a lot, though, but I'd expect it to last more than that. The battery life was awful though, at most 2.5 hours of continuous use. I'm not sure if I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: robespierre

customer_reviews.title: Primarily use was for the gym. Doesn't stay in ...
customer_reviews.text: Primarily use was for the gym. Doesn't stay in your ears very well and the battery lasts 2-3 hours between charges. Ended up going with LG bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: TheMountainLife

customer_reviews.title: Ear buds too large
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and connect to my iPhone. However, the ear pieces are too large for me. Even though there are different sizes, none of them worked for me. Be aware that the ear pieces might not fit for your ears.
customer_reviews.author: eee

customer_reviews.title: Great in their day
customer_reviews.text: Great in their day. Battery life has waned over the last 3 years to barely an hour so its not really usable anymore, but still good pair of headphones. Sound quality is impressive and comfort is surprisingly good
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Xu

customer_reviews.title: Falling out of my ears = :(
customer_reviews.text: These are bulky and stick out of my head looking quite silly. However - that is a minor issue compared to the fit factor. PLEASE BEWARE! These will not stay in during a workout. Maybe an elliptical will be ok but even that I found slippage and the sound gets crappy so I find myself constantly re-adjusting these in my ears which is not what I want while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Justin B Oberg

customer_reviews.title: Great size and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Great size and functionality, however much too quiet and tinny, not enough bass(its understandable though, haven't found any BT headphones like this that sounded really stellar)
customer_reviews.author: Dolac

customer_reviews.title: works great but I think they should put another rechargeable battery in the other ear
customer_reviews.text: works great but I think they should put another rechargeable battery in the other ear a well and the mic sounds like your'e talking from a tin can I have been told. negatives aside... It fits well, chordless is great, very good sound and excellent iPhone blue tooth connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Erik G

customer_reviews.title: It sounds a little dull. Bluetooth connection interfere with my gear 2 neo ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and as described. Battery life is little short has to be fully charged to last 2.5 hrs for my bike ride. It sounds a little dull. Bluetooth connection interfere with my gear 2 neo connection to the note 3
customer_reviews.author: gps123

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding headset.
customer_reviews.text: The headset sounds great. No problems pairing with a Moto X. Falls a bit short on battery life (4.5 hours), but not a showstopper. Once you get the earbuds properly seated in your ear, the buds make a good seal that allow you to enjoy quality base tones. It's nice to not be wired to my phone. The headset is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Very easy to set up, paired almost immediately with no issues. Charges quickly. Voice prompts make it easy to tell what is happening. Neutral: Battery life is about as advertised (~4 hours). The size and weight of the earbuds takes some getting used to. No issues afterwards though. Con: Fairly lacking in base compared to other headphones I've tried or owned.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Fedman

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of bluetooth headphones to use in both the gym and on the road. These are great in both instances! When I'm at the gym I can listen to my music without having to be connected to my phone. No wire getting in the way or tangled! When I'm running on the road I really like that I can store my phone in a hidden pocket out of sight and can still listen to my playlists. The controls on the headphones are very easy to use. I charge them about once a week, and that is probably after 5-6 hours of use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M Bell

customer_reviews.title: Overall poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used this set religiously for about 2-3 months now, and the battery is already draining at a maximum of 2 hours (4.5 hours is a dream of mine). Also, the silicon ear stabilizing pieces dont stay in place anymore. They move around so much that one or both of the headphones come off of my ears too often when I'm moving around. Microphone has poor quality outside of buildings. I think they worked well for the first 2 months, but then started degrading in quality. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: brez

customer_reviews.title: Plays music but uncomfortable fit. Then fails before a year's term.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound comes out of these headphones. Bluetooth works as advertised. But the over extended cord leaves for too much movement and discomfort. I always had to move my cord around numerous times during my work out which is annoying for headphones at this price. Sadly it recently failed to play on side so now my headphones are useless after less than a year of use. Do not recommend this brand. Wish I had a way to return them. Big learning lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Beto Vargas

customer_reviews.title: I use it under hearing protection for mowing the lawn and it worked great. It pared easily with my android phone and ...
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised, I use it under hearing protection for mowing the lawn and it worked great. It pared easily with my android phone and I was able to get 20 feet from my phone without any loss of signal. Battery life is as stated 4 hours. But it charges with a standard mini USB plug so keeping it charged should not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great first pair of bluetooth earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Context: First pair of bluetooth earbuds. Sound quality is good. Better than most cheapie earbuds. Maybe its me but they don't fit particularly in my ears. I have to really jam them in there to feel secure. the weight of the control panel definitely factors in the balance behind my neck. They always favor the side with the control panel.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Baltrusaitis

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I used this device during 5 months. Waterproof and sweatproof made me think this could be a long term investment, wrong. It's dead and no way to fix it; - The sound was acceptable, but the mic was very noisy; - Size is huge; - Couldn't connect to multiple devices simultaneously; - Battery life was acceptable, but improvement was required; I was reasonably happy with it until last week when it went MIA. Price/quality was a little disappointing but lasting just 5 month is ridiculous. Cannnot recommend it al all
customer_reviews.author: jpsoto

customer_reviews.title: these buds sound pretty damn good
customer_reviews.text: Once you find the right fitting covers & exactly how to wear them, these buds sound pretty damn good. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating is because the battery only lasts me about 3 1/2 hours as opposed to the specs' rated 4 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: PMD

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They told me they would work on two phone and they don’t what a disappointment. Thought this was a good brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: battery life may be low, but not a real problem.
customer_reviews.text: Battery life may be low, but that's not a real problem if you're not living on them. The sound quality is excellent. The range is very good; 33 ft. This handy if you are connected to a tablet. They can be linked to more than one device. Great for a quick grap and go on your way out with just your phone. Make no mistake, just because they're bluetooth doesn't mean that sound quality isn't there. I like the short charge cable because recharging can be just about anywere without taking up much space.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This item is very good. It included 3 sizes of ear buds, which was a good thing because the larger ones were too big and kept falling out of my ears. They still tend to slip out because of their bulk, but only use them during exercise, so they will do ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lily M.

customer_reviews.title: All about that bass?
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase these if you expect ANY bass. Otherwise rock them out. The are well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Consumer

customer_reviews.title: If only it charged consistently.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones. The sound is fine and not having to worry about cords is great. My one significant complaint is that the USB socket is too large. I've tried a few USB plugs and they don't fit snugly into it, so sometimes it doesn't charge. It's disappointing to find this dead after a night of "charging".
customer_reviews.author: Reviewing

customer_reviews.title: Best running headphones I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about these headphones. They fit securely. The bluetooth works really well. I sweat a lot, and I haven't had a problem with the earbuds falling out. The only slight gripe I have is battery life. It would be great if they would get more than 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: espresso lover

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it...
customer_reviews.text: If I could give these a 0 that would be my rating
customer_reviews.author: Shalla Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good but functionality is terrible. The earbuds NOT stay in the ear at all. They are especially terrible when I lay down on a weight bench, they just fall out or become very loose. I would not recommend these earbuds, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good BT connection but extremely uncomfortable. Hurts like hell and not properly secured in the ears. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris737

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Bluetooth headphones. I gave four stars because they could be a little louder and they don't always seem to fit perfectly. seems I'm always messing with their fit. Otherwise a very good quality wireless product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Way too big and not loud at all.
customer_reviews.text: really big ears that come out at every turn. This is really something you should be able to see before you buy. I had a 6 dollar pair that i like a lot more. These are also really quite even though they're really, really big.
customer_reviews.author: MR.B

customer_reviews.title: Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. Would be 5 if battery life was better. usually have to charge them everyday or if you use them straight for more than an hour or two straight. Dont even feel them while running and they do stay put. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set, got it on time, when I opened it, plugged it into a wall to charge and the red LED never went off, even after more than the 2.5 hours that the manual says. Checked online for the problem, I see I'm not an isolated case, I love the packaging and form factor, but I will return it to Amazon for changing. Plantronics tech support has had this issues before and always responds "your unit will have to be replaced". I hope the next unit works.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Villagomez

customer_reviews.title: fairly decent
customer_reviews.text: I use a life proof case for my iPhone which doesn't let me plug in any headphones I want with out an attachment. As Bluetooth headphones I have used so far: these have about average range, great battery life when idling (I would get the charger case if you will be using constantly with long periods between charging) and great clarity. I accidentally left mine on for three days without being connected to my phone and when I reconnected them, I had over 75% left. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Craiker

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat GO 2 Bluetooth Wireless Stereo Earbuds - Retail Packaging - White
product_meta.description:
Style:Without Charging Case| Color:White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingPlantronics Backbeat GO 2 wireless ear buds deliver immersive audio for your non stop life, so you can lose the cord, free your music, and still take that call. Designed to seal in the bass and block out the noise, you'll quickly lose yourself in the soundtrack of your day. Whether you're sweating out the stress or swaying to the beat, the military grade moisture resistance protects against an intense workout or a coffee spill. If you tuck it away and forget to power it off, the Deep Sleep hibernation mode keeps ear buds charged and ready to use for up to six months. Unleash your music and GO.

AMAZON.COM


NO CORDS, NO COMPROMISE
Plantronics BackBeat GO 2 wireless earbuds deliver immersive audio for your non-stop life, so you can lose the cord, free your music, and still take that call. Designed to seal in the bass and block out the noise, you'll quickly lose yourself in the soundtrack of your day. Whether you're sweating out the stress or swaying to the beat, the military-grade moisture resistance protects against an intense workout or a coffee spill. 


BackBeat GO 2 wireless earbuds (view larger). The BackBeat GO 2 comes with three sizes of cushioned eartips and two fit stabilizers for a secure, comfortable fit. You'll get up to 4.5 hours of listening time and up to 5 hours of talk time from these ultralight earbuds, as well as up to 10 days of standby time. If you tuck it away and forget to power it off, the DeepSleep hibernation mode keeps the earbuds charged and ready to use for up to six months. 

UNLEASH YOUR MUSIC AND GO
The Bluetooth-enabled BackBeat GO 2 wireless earbuds easily slip into your pocket, but still pack a full-on stereo sound. You can listen to music, chat with friends, or watch movies on your tablet -- even play games on the go.

A convenient inline controller lets you manage calls, play and pause music, and skip tracks while your smartphone is conveniently tucked away in your pocket or bag. An inline microphone captures your voice so you sound clear and natural during phone calls.

MOISTURE PROTECTION
You can rely on the BackBeat GO 2 to work as hard as you do -- through rain, sweat, and the inevitable coffee spill. BackBeat GO 2 earbuds are protected against sweat and moisture damage by P2i technology. The nano-coating is applied during the manufacturing process, resulting in invisible liquid repellent properties that also makes the earbuds more reliable, wherever your busy life takes you.

ONSCREEN BATTERY METER
Keep track of the battery life of your BackBeat GO 2 earbuds with a handy battery meter that automatically displays onscreen for iPhone and iPad. The free Plantronics Battery Meter widget enables a battery meter on smartphones running Android 4.0 and later and tablets running Android 3.0 and later.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Plantronics BackBeat GO 2 earbuds, AC charger, three eartips (small, medium, large), fit stabilizers, quick start guide

BACKBEAT GO 2, WHITE
KEY FEATURES
 * Earbuds seal in the crisp highs, natural mid-tones, and rich bass so you hear every nuance
   
   
 * Military-grade moisture resistance and rugged, tangle-free cable won't let you down
   
   
 * DeepSleep mode puts buds into hibernation when away from phone to extend battery life 
   
   
 * Inline controls make it easy to take calls, skip tracks, and adjust volume
   
   
 * Multiple fit options secure earbuds for active use and all day wearing
   
   
 * Up to 4.5 hours of listen time, 5 hours of talk time, and 10 days of standby time

Includes three sizes of eartips (black shown, view larger). 
For use with Bluetooth-enabled smartphones (view larger). 
Freedom from cords (view larger). 
Also for use with tablets -- both Android and iOS (view larger). PLANTRONICS BACKBEAT COMPARISON CHART
Models BackBeat 903+ BackBeat GO BackBeat GO2 BackBeat GO2 + Charging Case Audio Quality 14mm speaker drivers plus enhanced bass 1st generation 6mm speaker drivers 3rd generation 6mm speaker drivers plus enhanced bass Listening Time Up to 7 hours Up to 4.5 hours Up to 4.5 hours Standby Time Up to 168 hours Up to 240 hours Up to 6 months with DeepSleep hibernation mode Device Connectivity Single-device connection Single-device connection 8-device memory for easy switching Stability and Fit Three-way adjustment with contoured eartips Standard in-ear design with stabilizers Redesigned ear tips and stabilizers Play & Volume Controls Dedicated buttons on ear and behind ear Standard inline controller 2nd generation inline controller with intuitive, tactile controls P2i Sweat Resistant Technology No P2i coated for sweat and water resistance* P2i coated for sweat and water resistance Call Experience Two standard omni microphones plus Standard omni microphone plus full duplex echo cancellation MEMS microphone plus full duplex echo cancellation Storage Case Soft mesh storage case No No Ballistic nylon rechargeable case 

Up to 10 more hours of added listening time

LED status charge level indicators blink every 10 seconds when earbuds are plugged in

* Available on models released after October, 2012
feature_bullets: WIRELESS EARBUDS: Bluetooth enabled cordless headphones allow you to lose the cord while providing an enhanced and immersive audio experience
LONG LASTING BATTERY LIFE: Includes a charging case which offers up to 14.5 hours of listening time with 20 minutes of charge time giving an extra hour of battery life
COMPACT: Bluetooth enabled wireless earbuds easily slip into your pocket making them perfect travel headphones while still packing a full on stereo sound
COMFORT: Multiple fit options give secure earbuds for active and all day wearing
